name: node-disco
description: An silent disco back-end written in NodeJS

scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:less && npm run build:client:copy && npm run build:client:browserify
scripts.build:client:browserify: browserify client/client.js > public/client.js && uglifyjs public/client.js -cm > public/client.min.js
scripts.release: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:exec && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:prepare: git checkout release && git reset --hard master && npm run build:client && npm test
scripts.release:exec: git add public -f && git commit -m "chore(project): add client + release"
scripts.release:publish: git push openshift HEAD:master -f && git checkout master

author: Nico Rehwaldt <git_nikku@nixis.de>
